item.title: Why this blog
item.description: Why this blog Humans are lazy by nature (there is a chance that someone is reading this post right now to avoid picking-up the next Jira ticket, for example). It is too easy to lock ourselves inside our knowledge silos and keep doing the same thing. Maybe you need a routine and predictability, maybe you think you do well this one thing. Whatever the reason, it is fine. Because at the same time, humans are curious by nature too.
